channel.title: How do u change trainn xp rate? and start zone?
channel.description:
hiya fans on moparscpe i need help on 2 things
1) when u train its 1 hit to lvl 99 ea skill like ummm 3-10mins till reach lvl 99? 2) how do i change start zone??

item.title: How do u change trainn xp rate? and start zone?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i searched wt u said for xp rate and this came up

TotalExp = (double)(12 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
wt do i edit there?

i searched in client.java that right?

Read full topic
item.source: How do u change trainn xp rate? and start zone?

item.title: How do u change trainn xp rate? and start zone?
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

Right click on the object to find it’s ID.

Now search that ID in client.java

Look for the number that controls the EXP and lower it.

Repeat for other training items.

To change the start location…

Create a new account and type “::coordson”, and don’t move
Search the first co-ordinate in player.java
Change the X and the Y to the desired start location

Read full topic

item.title: How do u change trainn xp rate? and start zone?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

  1. In your server, you need to search for your attacking voids, and switch the “addxp” to a smaller number, so it won’t achieve level 99 in one skill.

  2. As I recall it is in your server.java, you need to search for your current coordinants, and then change them like that.

Read full topic
